main.name: Khoury Smith
main.description: Front End Developer by Day, Freelancer && Couch Potato by Night. #flexboxninja
main.bio: Hey, my name is Khoury. I'm a Software Engineer. I love Call of Duty, and if I use the shotgun you won't have a chance. Once upon a time I thought, I was going to be a professional football player. Obviously that didn't happen but I'd bet that I am the fastest developer you ever met. We can race at anytime! As a Frontend Developer, I enjoy using my obsessive attention to detail, my unequivocal love for making things, and my mission-driven work ethic to literally change the world.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

education.degree: Master of Science in Marketing & Management Communication
Bachelor of Science in Graphic Design

work.title: Tech Lead Frontend Engineer
work.description: Led frontend architecture for scalable platforms using React, TypeScript, and Vite—boosting performance and maintainability. Spearheaded Vitras.ai, an AI platform with 4,000+ users. Delivered full-stack solutions integrating 3D data for carbon reports, built server-driven UIs, enforced code quality through reviews, and implemented robust Cypress tests for reliability.

work.title: Senior Manager of Product Engineering – Software Engineering
work.description: Led the innovation and design of software engineering curricula tailored to both in-person and remote delivery, aligning with industry needs and learner outcomes. Designed and prototyped new modules featuring React, JavaScript, and TypeScript, and partnered with cross-functional teams to implement scalable, impactful educational solutions.

work.title: Lead Frontend Engineer
work.description: Engineered a high-traffic, multidimensional website with Next.js, driving 5,000+ monthly users and boosting engagement by 20%. Led end-to-end project development—from ideation to launch—ensuring performance and UX goals were met. Mentored junior engineers, championing best practices and a culture of continuous improvement.

work.title: Frontend Engineer
work.description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams in agile standups to ensure precise feature delivery, reducing development cycles by 63%. Revamped the login flow and menu architecture using React, resulting in a 20% increase in daily user acquisitions.

projects.title: Earnings Tournament
projects.category: Show off your market instincts and build the longest streak of opening gap direction picks to have a chance at up to $5,000 in prizes.

projects.title: Gap Gambler
projects.category: Landing Page for Gap Gambler stock platform

testimonials.text: We want to thank Khoury for the wonderful job in helping us build our website. He was professional, excellent and hard working
I was really impressed by the quality of work from Khoury
